students.title: Student Verification
students.description: You can verify using any proof of student status, such as digital or physical student ID, library card, certificate of enrollment, school's webstie login status, tuition bill, etc.

alert.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
alert.confirmMessage: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including your points, and refunds or recovery will be difficult. Do you wish to continue?

invitation.title: Invite your friends with your referral code and earn points!
invitation.subtitle: Both you and your friend will receive 100 points.
invitation.notice1: Invitation code input only rewards points once at first.
invitation.notice2: Points are only rewarded at initial sign-up, not on re-registration.
invitation.notice3: Entering the referral code grants points to both you and your friend.

toast.alreadyJoined: You have already joined this event.
toast.notValidCode: The invitation code is not valid.
toast.notSelf: You cannot enter your own invitation code.
toast.deleted: This invitation code belongs to a user who has withdrawn.

attendance.title: Check-in Mission
attendance.description:

to receive points

verification.title: School Verification
verification.description: Verify your school and receive a Buddyya badge and points
